SINGLE_CLASS_DESC: Generates random events from a specific OCSF class.
SCENARIO_MODE_DESC: Generates attack scenarios that create a logical event chain.
GRAPH_DESC-1: This graph visualizes the relationships between the
GRAPH_DESC-2: events generated on the 'Data Generator' page. You can interact with the graph by clicking on or hovering over the nodes.
PERFORMANCE_WARNING: Performance Warning: The graph contains too many nodes. To improve readability, only the first {{nodeCount}} nodes are displayed. Please use the filters to see more details.
NO_VISIBLE_NODES: No relationships to visualize were found for the selected filters. Please change your filter selection or return to the 'Data Generator' page to create new data.
NO_DATA_PROMPT: To view the graph, please first generate data from the 'Data Generator' page.
LABEL: Label
CHOOSE_JSON_FILE_OR_DRAG: Choose JSON File or Drag and Drop
NO_DATA_FOR_FILTERS: No data found for the selected filters.
